code: @Override public void run(ApplicationArguments args) throws Exception {     this.serviceProperties.getInputDir().mkdirs().     if (args.getNonOptionArgs().size() > 0) {         FileOutputStream stream = new FileOutputStream(new File(this.serviceProperties.getInputDir(), "data" + System.currentTimeMillis() + ".txt")).         for (String arg : args.getNonOptionArgs()) {             stream.write(arg.getBytes()).         }         stream.flush().         stream.close().     } }
public static void main(String[] args) {     SpringApplication.run(ProducerApplication.class, args). }
